name: Tae.exe
description:
Enjoy a unique experience where you play outside the game.

Tae.exe is a meta puzzle game where you interact with the game's files. Help Tae to get out of the Metaverse, a glitched dimension between video games. Tae.exe is inspired by Doki Doki : Literature Club, Undertale, The Stanley Parable and other meta-games.

Advice : Think outside the game
Tae.exe (formely Think Outside the Game) is a 3 month student project started on March 20th and ended on June 5th, in the context of a video game  master degree (Master JMIN at CNAM ENJMIN in France).

Follow us on Twitter and Facebook !

Note:
  • Game available in French & English
  • ONLY WORKS ON WINDOWS 10 IN ADMINISTRATOR MODE
Team

Game Designer - Darenn Keller

Producer - William Désert

Programmer - Ervan Silvert

Shader Artist - Vincent Stehly--Calisto

Character Designer - Raoul Mavoulouque

Sound Designers/Composers - Marie-Valentine David & Robin Richard
